org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Viral Load Eligibility 2.0
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT global_property.property_value as DatimCode, pid1.identifier AS PepfarID, pid2.identifier AS HospID, pn3.given_name AS FirstName, pn3.family_name AS FamilyName, person.gender AS Sex, CONCAT(person_address.address1," ",person_address.city_village) as PatientAddress, CONCAT("234-",psn_atr.value) AS RegistrationPhoneNo, MAX(IF(target.concept_id=159635, CONCAT("234-",obs.value_text), NULL)) AS `CurrentPhoneNo`, MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164946, CONCAT("234-",obs.value_text), NULL)) AS `NextOfKinPhoneNo`, DATE_FORMAT (person.birthdate, '%d-%b-%Y') AS DOB, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) AS Age, DATE_FORMAT (pprg.date_enrolled , '%d-%b-%Y') AS EnrollmentDate, MAX(IF(target.concept_id=165050 AND person.gender='F', cn1.name, NULL)) AS `PregnancyStatus`, MAX(IF(target.concept_id=165050 AND person.gender='F', DATE_FORMAT(obs.obs_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `PregnancyStatusDate` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=5596 AND person.gender='F', DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'),null)) as `EDD` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=159599, DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `ARTStartDate` ,MAX(IF((target.concept_id=165708 and enc.form_id=27), DATE_FORMAT(target.last_date, '%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `LastDrugPickUpDate` ,getconceptval(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=162240,obs.obs_id,null) ),159368,patient.patient_id) as `DaysOfARVRefil`
,IFNULL(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165470,cn1.name,null)) , getoutcome( MAX(IF((obs.concept_id=165708 and enc.form_id=27),target.last_date,null)), getconceptval(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=162240,obs.obs_id,null) ),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, IF(:endDate IS NULL or :endDate = '', CURDATE(),:endDate ) )) as `CurrentARTStatus` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856 AND enc.form_id=21,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) AS `CurrentViralLoad` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856 AND enc.form_id=21,DATE_FORMAT(obs.obs_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `CurrentViralLoadDate` ,MAX(IF(enc.form_id=67, DATE_FORMAT(enc.encounter_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'),NULL)) as `LastViralLoadSampleCollectionFormDate` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=165708 and enc.form_id=27, cn1.name, NULL)) AS ` CurrentRegimenLine` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164506 and enc.form_id=27 ,cn1.name, NULL)) AS `LastFirstLineRegimen` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164506 and enc.form_id=27,DATE_FORMAT(obs.obs_datetime , '%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `LastFirstLineRegimenDate` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164513 and enc.form_id=27,cn1.name, NULL)) AS `LastSecondLineRegimen` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164513 and enc.form_id=27, DATE_FORMAT(obs.obs_datetime , '%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) AS `LastSecondLineRegimenDate` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164702 and enc.form_id=27,cn1.name, NULL)) AS `LastThirdLineRegimen` ,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=164702 and enc.form_id=27,obs.obs_datetime, NULL)) AS `LastThirdLineRegimenDate`
FROM patient LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid1 ON(pid1.patient_id=patient .patient_id AND pid1.identifier_type=4 AND pid1.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid2 ON(pid2.patient_id=patient .patient_id AND pid2.identifier_type=5 AND pid2.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person_address on(person_address.person_id=patient.patient_id and person_address.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person_name pn3 ON(patient .patient_id=pn3.person_id AND pn3.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person ON(person.person_id=patient .patient_id) LEFT JOIN person_attribute psn_atr ON (person.person_id=psn_atr.person_id and psn_atr.person_attribute_type_id=8) LEFT JOIN patient_program pprg ON(pprg.patient_id=person.person_id AND pprg.voided=0 AND pprg.program_id=1) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT obs.person_id, obs.concept_id, MAX(obs.obs_datetime) AS last_date FROM obs where obs.obs_datetime<=:endDate and obs.voided=0 and obs.concept_id IN(159599, 5596,165050,856,165708,164506,164507,164513,164514,165702,165703,165470,164989,7778430,159951,159635,164946,159951,159368,162240,159368,165470,165708) GROUP BY obs.person_id, obs.concept_id) target ON (target.person_id=patient.patient_id)
INNER JOIN obs ON(obs.person_id=target.person_id AND obs.concept_id=target.concept_id AND obs.obs_datetime=target.last_date AND obs.obs_datetime<=:endDate AND obs.concept_id IN(159599, 5596,165050,856,165708,164506,164507,164513,164514,165702,165703,165470,164989,7778430,159951,159635,164946,159951,159368,162240,159368,165470,165708)) INNER JOIN encounter enc on(enc.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and enc.voided=0) LEFT JOIN concept_name cn1 ON(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id AND cn1.locale='en' AND cn1.locale_preferred=1) LEFT JOIN global_property on(global_property.property='facility_datim_code') where patient.voided=0 GROUP BY patient.patient_id HAVING
IFNULL(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165470,cn1.name,null)) , getoutcome( MAX(IF((obs.concept_id=165708 and enc.form_id=27),target.last_date,null)), getconceptval(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=162240,obs.obs_id,null) ),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, IF(:endDate IS NULL or :endDate = '', CURDATE(),:endDate ) ) ) = 'Active'
AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=159599,obs.obs_datetime, NULL)),:endDate)>=6 AND ( ( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856,target.last_date, NULL)),:endDate)>=12 AND MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856,obs.value_numeric, NULL))<1000 ) OR ( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856,target.last_date, NULL)),:endDate)>=3 AND MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856,obs.value_numeric, NULL))>1000 ) OR MAX(IF(target.concept_id=856,obs.value_numeric, NULL)) IS NULL )
